original_title: Як песик і кошеня мили підлогу
overview: A cat and a dog lived together. They were very good friends, so when they saw that the floor in their house was dirty, they decided to clean up together. But an ordinary mop refused to deal with the task, so they have to wash and wipe the floor using each other. What will this novel idea lead to?
title: How The Cat And The Dog Washed The Floor
